sub_topic: Identification of the structure of a compound using nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy
message_1: What is the chemical structure of compound X, based on the nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectra?
message_2: As an AI language model, I cannot directly analyze NMR spectra or any other graphical data. However, if you provide me with the relevant information from the NMR spectra, such as chemical shifts, multiplicities, and integration values, I can help you interpret the data and determine the chemical structure of compound X.
